CreateEvent
This class is responsible for creating an event and adding it to the database.
Entrant
Entrant class represents an entrant in the app.
EntrantList
EntrantList is a class that holds a list of Entrant objects.
Event
Event class that holds all the information for an event
EventArrayAdapter
EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter that is used to display the individual events in event lists.
EventDetails
 
EventList
EventList class is a list of events.
EventQrScanner
This class is responsible for scanning the QR code of the event.
EventsHomeActivity
EventsHomeActivity is the main activity for the Events Home screen.
Facility
Facility represents a location where an event can be held.

FullscreenQrScanner
FullscreenQrScanner is a custom Activity that extends CaptureActivity from the ZXing library.
MainActivity
Relevant Documentation and Resources: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/SharedPreferences https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48740056/splash-screen-using-handler
ManageMyEventsFragment
This activity is responsible for managing the events created by the organizer.
MyEventsFragment
This class is a fragment that displays the list of events the user has signed up for.
Organizer
Organizer class is a class that represents the organizer of the event.
OrganzierEventArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying events in the OrganizerEventsActivity
PlaceholderContent
Helper class for providing sample content for user interfaces created by Android template wizards.
PlaceholderContent.PlaceholderItem
A placeholder item representing a piece of content.
SecondFragment
 
SignUpActivity
SignUpActivity is the Activity that allows the user to sign up for the event.
